data.title: Barbara Robinson
data.meta_description: Barbara Robinson. Writer: Best Christmas Pageant Ever. Barbara Robinson was born on 24 October 1927 in Portsmouth, Ohio, USA. She was a writer, known for Best Christmas Pageant Ever, Wir warten auf's Christkind (1960) and The Best Christmas Pageant Ever (1983). She was married to John F. Robinson. She died on 9 July 2013 in Berwyn, Pennsylvania, USA.
data.text: Barbara Robinson was born on 24 October 1927 in Portsmouth, Ohio, USA. She was a writer, known for Best Christmas Pageant Ever, Wir warten auf's Christkind (1960) and The Best Christmas Pageant Ever (1983). She was married to John F. Robinson. She died on 9 July 2013 in Berwyn, Pennsylvania, USA.
